position.marginalia_text: natura disponit me[m]bra ip[s]ius foetus, sic et istud corpus rubeum est pars integralis eleisixis, seu medicina[e]. Nam in omni compositione, qua[e] fit, postea istud corpus creatum est, cadit, semper tanq[uam] pars integralis co[m]positionis, vt inferius declarabitur Item notetis quod istudcorpus habet multa no[m]i[n]a. Vocetur eni[m] Adam, A[e]stas, almagra, aleum, anima, aries, aurum, canter, Camereth, cinis tartaxi Cholera, Corpus propriu[m], Corpus rubeum, Corsufle, Deeb, Debab, Ferrum, Forma, frater, Fructus, Gallus, Gophris, gemma rubea, Homo, Juventus, Kibrit, Lapis indrademus, Lapis indus, Lapis rubeus, Lux, magnesia rubea, mane, Mars, Marthek, Masculus Metros, minera, Neusi, Nutus, Oleum martis, Oleum inco[n]bustabile, Oleum rubeum, Oliva, Oriens, Pater, Reczon, rubedo, rubinus, Sal vrima[e], Seviros, SOL, sulphur rubeum, Terra rubea, Tertius, thios, Vinum, Vitellus, vitrolium rubeum, vitrum, zaaph, et etia[m] multis alijs no[min]ibus a sapie[nta]libus appelllatur: qua[e] quide[m] no[m]i[n]a no[n] sicut et attributa secund[m] vna[m] r[ati]o[n]em, seu proportione[m]. Na[m] philosophi qui vocaceru[n]t eum Adam, a[e]state[m], Almagra, Altum, anima[m], arite[m], annu[m], cannu[m], Carmeth, Cholera[m], cimere[m] tartari, corpus p[ro]priu[m], consufle, Deeb, Debab, Forma[m], fratre[m], fructum, gallu[m] gophris, Homine[m] inventute[m], Kibrit, Lapidem fridrademu[m]. lapide[m], indu[m], Lure[m] mane, martem/Marthek, Masculum, Metroy, Minera[m], Neusim, Nutum, Olivam, Oriente[m], Patre[m], Rerzon, Sal vrima[e], solem, tertium, thioy, vinum, vitru[m], Zaaph, dixerunt hoc propter sua[m] complexione[m]. Na[m] o[mn]ia ha[e]c dixeru[n]t quia calida[e] et sicca[e] co[m]plexionis sunt. Oni vero vocaverunt ip[s]um corpus rubeum, gemma[m] rubea[m], lapide[m] rubeu[m], Magnesia[m] rubea[m], Oleu[m] rubeu[m], rubedine[m], Rubinu[m], seriroy, Sulphur rubeu[m], Terra[m] rubeu[m]
